statements: DELETE FROM Revenue_Report WHERE report_id = 100 AND report_date = '2022-01-15'
DELETE FROM Revenue_Report WHERE profit_margin > 0.2 AND customer_retention < 0.5
DELETE FROM revenue_reports WHERE revenue_amount > 1000 AND report_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM profit_margin_reports WHERE profit_margin < 0.2 OR report_date >= '2022-02-01';
DELETE FROM revenue_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01' AND location_id = 100;
DELETE FROM profit_margin_reports WHERE profit_margin > 0.2 AND product_id = 50;
DELETE FROM business_performance WHERE report_id = 100 AND margin_id = 200;
